```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(squashinformr)
library(here)
library(glue)
library(readr)
```

```{r}
df <- get_tournaments(year = 2021)
```

```{r}
games <- NULL

for (tournament in unique(df$name)) {
  results <- get_tournament_games(tournament = tournament, year = 2021, world_tour = TRUE)
  games <- bind_rows(games, results)
}

games
```

## Export csv
```{r}
write_csv(games, glue("{here::here()}/games_data.csv"))
```
